inclusion.criterion: at least 13 years of age and menstruating
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to enroll in another drug study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: written consent of a parent or guardian if under 18 years
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: receiving medication that affects the immune system, fights HPV, or is investigational
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has cervical cancer and a history of smoking. She was offered a radical hysterectomy.
